page.title: 06BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {Mr.A.Tawse}has lived in Madresfield for 14 years. He has been {Church {Warden}for 6 years. This entails looking after the contents of the church, ( mainly the silver ), supervising the collection money, and acting as the Bishop's helper. Madresfield Church has 31 people on the Electoral Roll. {Mr.Tawse}has worked as a gardener at Madresfield Court for 13 years. He started as an apprentice at 16.He works 40 hours a week, and has 3 weeks holiday per year. He earns Â£90 per week. 50 years ago, there were 30 gardens at the Court.Now there are only 3,covering 8 acres. 2000 plants are used each year, including roses, vines,water lilies, and herbaceous plants. By James Clarke, Stuart McCulloch.
